solution_line_template: Every minute, {drips_per_minute} * {volume_per_drop} = <<{drips_per_minute}*{volume_per_drop}={wasted_per_minute}>>{wasted_per_minute} mL of water are wasted.
Every hour, {wasted_per_minute} * {minutes_per_hour} =<<{wasted_per_minute}*{minutes_per_hour}={wasted_per_hour}>>{wasted_per_hour} mL of water are wasted.
